channel.title: What are "Introductions"?
channel.description:
Before you make your first post we'd love you to post an intro to yourself and your business/product(s). This gives everybody some background context which helps keep the conversations flowing!
[Update: New users can only post two links in their posts to prevent spamming - if you want to update your profile with more later when you get settled that'll be totally fine. Thanks.]
Feel free to lurk without posting for a while though...

item.title: What are "Introductions"?
item.dc:creator: attaboy
item.description:
Hi, my name is Jim East I’m old and retired but am interested in web programming. I used to do some Flash. I did a lot of work on this site http://www.archscapecg.com//indexFlash.html and I wrote this for fun http://jimslounge.com/publicDomain/. I hope to get up and running with Bootstrap before I get too old.

Read full topic
